data.description: A module for proxying web resources
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a mod_perl module that provides a filtering proxy using
    subdomains. None of the modules that I have seen use this technique
    for proxying multiple hosts/domains. This enables the module to be
    configured and then have it's configuration dynamically updated
    without the need for restarting your web server.
